siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
blogPost.body: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
blogPost.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble
blogPost.author: Vladislav Len

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。

previous.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
previous.title: Pageturner - Let's build a reading habit, together

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

localize.description: Pageturner是一個免費的社區，爲讀者和人們建立他們的閱讀習慣。公開閱讀和分享你的筆記，讓你發現有趣的想法，並讓你負責任。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起養成閱讀的習慣吧

next.excerpt: Follab is a platform for collect, organize and analyze customer feedback. No more outdated spreadsheets, caothic Trello boards or try to keep track of everything in Slack.
next.title: Follab - Capture, organize, and analyze customer feedback

localize.description: Follab是一个收集、整理和分析客户反馈的平台。不再有过时的电子表格、caothic的Trello板或试图在Slack中跟踪一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客户反馈

localize.description: Follab是一個收集、整理和分析客戶反饋的平臺。不再有過時的電子表格、caothic的Trello板或試圖在Slack中跟蹤一切。
localize.tagline: 收集、整理、分析客戶反饋
